item.title: CVE-2022-45374|2024-06-05T19:18:50.656Z -- yarpp -- yarpp
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in YARPP allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects YARPP: from n/a through 5.30.4.
